wikipedia_page.main: John Burt was an English professional footballer. A centre forward, he played in the Football League for just one club, Blackpool.

response: * John Burt (rugby union) (1874–1933), New Zealand rugby union player, cricketer and businessman
* John Burt (field hockey) (1877–1935), Scottish field hockey player
* John Burt (anti-abortion activist) (1938–2013), American anti-abortion activist and child-molester
